page.title: 07Cricket Clubs
page.content: On Sunday mornings Andrew and Jeremy play for{Ellingham Cricket Club}in the {Dorset Club Championship League.}This week we will be playing against Hyde. On Sunday morning at about 10 o'clock we will be batting or fielding. Last week we beat Pennington by 4 runs. The man in charge is Mr. Pepperwell. We play for the under fourteens team. In the winter we practise at the{ {Sports Centre}in{Ringwood.}We play in the main hall on a special rubber mat. Mr. Osborne teaches us cricket at school where Andrew is the school cricket captain. On July 11th we are going to the{Hampshire County Ground} to play in the{Lord's Taverners'Final. We are playing where{Hampshire County {Cricket Club}play and we shall be using the dressing room where the pro- fessionals change. { }
